thread.section_title: Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Unbelievable hotel, unbelievable service!
thread.title_full: Unbelievable hotel, unbelievable service! - Review of Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nigar2006
title: Unbelievable hotel, unbelievable service!
text:
I stayed with my kids there, the hotel is fantastic with superior service. Personal is so kind and friendly and takes so much care of you, you really feel u like at home. My kid was sick and the staff has organized a doctor visit at non working day. I would especially mention Mr. Richard from concierge, he was so kind and helpful to us!!! Thanks a lot!!! My young son enjoyed pool at the spa, was ready to stay there all the day.
Would be happy to come back again!
